casebody.data:
Melissa Lennon, Employee, Plaintiff,
v.
N.C. Judicial Department, N.C. Administrative Office of the Courts, Harnett County Clerk of Superior Court Employer, Self-insured (Corvel Corporatoin, Third-Party Administrator), Defendant. No. COA16-476 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 6, 2016

AFFIRMED.
